Cases

The tumor is present in the left frontal lobe and nearby corticospinal tract. Fiber bundle are obtained by using 150 variations of the same bundle based on uncertainty simulation. The results below shows 100% of the resulting fiber variations. Based on the resulting fiber tracts, you have to make a decision for tumor resection surgery.

Question Based on the resulting fiber tracts, do you think the margins are enough to choose the awake procedure for the tumor resection surgery?

  • Very confident
